title: hot keys
body:
off and on now my hot keys will not work and it hasnt been an issue as i would just relog and it fixed the problem.
but today started a whole worse problem now they dont work ever ive tried multiple relogs and even resetting my computer is there a patch that can fix this ive looked but all post or forums i find are outdated

replies.body:
There could be a few reasons for what's causing this like a corrupt game file, or a connection issue preventing your hotkeys from being synced.  You may also have problems like this if you are using any third parties that are interfering with the game.  As a first step, let's reset your bindings configuration to a fresh start and free of any corruption:


1) Login
2) Delete your PersistedSettings.json and input.ini files (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)
3) Go into a custom game
4) Exit the custom game (you will now have the default settings)
5)  Enter another custom game and save bindings to your preference.

Hopefully, this will get you fixed up!
